textline.data: An attacker shall not be able to replay a message
forged in the past by a client or a server, and which
has already been received by the client/server
An attacker shall not be able to forge a client
or a server message once the session
All data exchnaged between the client and the sever
All data exchanged between the server and the client
The server and the client shall be

infoparam.value:
#PrivatePublicKeys Server serverPrivK serverPubK #PrivatePublicKeys Server CAPrivK CAPubK #InitialSystemKnowledge Server.CAPubK Client.CAPubK #InitialSessionKnowledge Client.secretMessage Server.secretMessage
#Confidentiality Client.secretMessage #Authenticity Client.sendMessage2.secretMessage2 Server.authenticityCheck.filler1
